lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
Theo, Theo, Theo, Theo de se lene
Keria, keria, keria, keria de sou kaine
Alla ta lo… ta lo… ta logia sou kaine
Ki ako… ako… ako… akoma ta lene
Sokrati esy souperstar
Agnos kai kalos, o protos Christos
Sokrati esy souperstar
Me kapa zitianou gyrnouses
Kai st’ aspra sou genia poulia
Trigyro laos, ki esy agio fos
Sokrati esy souperstar
Gia agapi kai fos tous milouses
Sofe ton sofon vasilia
Theo, Theo, Theo, Theo de se lene
Keria, keria, keria, keria de sou kaine
Alla ta lo… ta lo… ta logia sou kaine
Ki ako… ako… ako… akoma ta lene
Sokrati esy souperstar
Theo, Theo, Theo, Theo de se lene
Keria, keria, keria, keria de sou kaine
Alla ta lo… ta lo… ta logia sou kaine
Ki ako… ako… ako… akoma ta lene
Sokrati esy souperstar, souperstar, souperstar
Pilatos laos, sou pire to fos
Sokrati esy souperstar
Ki i Athina pou toso agapouses
Farmaki sou dinei pikro
Pikri charavgi, orfaneve i gi
Sokrati esy souperstar
Tin ora pou esy xekinouses
Na vreis ton aionio Theo
